title: Confirmed: Jerry Jewell!
content:
We're excited to announce another prolific guest to our line up for JAFAX 2020, Jerry Jewell!

Jerry's prolific list of voice work includes over 200 characters from popular animé, including Kyo Sohma in "Fruits Basket" (original and 2019 versions), Jimmy Kudo in "Case Closed", and Victor Nikiforov in "Yuri!! on Ice". On top of his large catalog of roles as a voice talent, Jerry has worked as the ADR Director on over 45 titles, including "Blood C", "Seraph of the End", "A Certain Magical Index", "One Piece", "Free!", and many more.
